Name: SPACE BANDITOS
About the game: Between a group of bandits and a team of sheriffs, it's war. Everyone wants to reign over the area ... It's up to you to play as a bandit or a sheriff in SPACE BANDITOS, and to make the law reign, your law ! Through very spicy team games, you will have to play smart to find your place in this conflict zone. As a bandit, run to the capture zones and use your bomb and punch to keep enemies away from your objective. As sheriff, hide around the map to surprise an opponent and take its life using your sheriff equipment. SPACE BANDITOS is a 3v3v3 party game where each team has its own victory condition.
